name: rspack_offload
description: Speed up Webpack by offloading some workload to [rspack](https://rspack.dev)

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3002/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
scripts.legacy:e2e:ci: pnpm legacy:start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3002/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
